argument.name: columnName
argument.description: The column that you want to either show or hide.

page.description: Hide/show a column in a Repeating Section.
page.discussion: Hide/show a column in a Repeating Section. You can also set the visibility of a column to hidden or shown, rather than hide/showing it. By default, mode is 'hide'. Options for mode are 'hide','show','visibility_hide','visibility_show'.
